amendment.description: Amendment to provide a sense of the Congress to recognize and support large and small scale conventional hydropower.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 110-300 to provide a sense of the Congress to recognize and support large and small scale conventional hydropower.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sali amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 402 - 9 (Roll no. 829).
